name: chomy's warmups
description:
Simple warmups game light on pc hardware.

Good for Valorant (you have the tenz crosshair) and other shooter

2 modes:

left  - you choose how much the warmups will last, you have to hit the biggest amount of target

right - you have to choose how much target to hit

I  will be very happy if you give me feedback, if have any advice or you found a bug i will be happy to fix it

URL:  https://microstudio.io/chomy/warmups/
